message.content: {"id": "9654", "title": "Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details", "description": "The bug is related to the Modify Parameters dialog in which the name validation is duplicated on the first page. Additionally, the first and second columns in the dialog should be merged.", "SR": "When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. For example, the preview should display the entire name without truncation."}
